code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./OptimizationControls.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OptimizationControls=_ref=>{let{selectedFlight,onRun,loading}=_ref;const[modelType,setModelType]=useState('delgado_venezian');const handleRun=()=>{if(!selectedFlight){alert('Please select a flight first');return;}const request={flight_path:selectedFlight,model_type:modelType,restricted_locations:[]};onRun(request);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Optimization Controls"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Model Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:modelType,onChange:e=>setModelType(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"delgado_venezian",children:"DelgadoVenezian"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"baseline",children:"Baseline"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"optimized_actual",children:"Optimized Actual"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"bax_fixed",children:"BAX Fixed"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleRun,disabled:loading||!selectedFlight,children:loading?'Running...':'Run Optimization'})})]})]});};export default OptimizationControls;
